name: ArchXGreen Leaderboard
description: Purple agent performance ranking by pass rate
query: SELECT purple_agent_id as id, purple_agent_name, COUNT(*) as total_tasks, SUM(CAST(task_passed AS INTEGER)) as tasks_passed, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CAST(task_passed AS INTEGER)) / COUNT(*), 1) as pass_rate FROM results GROUP BY purple_agent_id, purple_agent_name ORDER BY pass_rate DESC
